name: JELLYBEANTIME
description:
Made in around 3 hours for Brins paradise jam. Click and maybe space. Download for best performance

A month or so ago we were getting candies for the in-person event for Essentia Omnia, and while there i got a buuunch of jelly beans for cheap. Timeskip a couple days, im in the kitchen, getting my appetizer game on. what i had at the time were jelly beans and some other candy that didnt make it into the game. So im pouring some into my hand, and they roll toward the centre cuz its cupped and then im thinking "i should combo the ones of one color so that i don't mix the flavours too much". and after a bit im thinking "shit this is kinda a fun game". And then i also had the idea of using the trippy shader i made a while ago in something i actually release and the long held intention of including the dad kite  golfing bit from psychonautwiki in one of my games and then lintilion mentioned the black dresses samplepack and therest just kinda grew naturally.
